name: Stuart Croll
what_you_do: Stuart Kroll is an animal rights advocate focused on improving conditions for community cats and establishing a municipal cat shelter in North Hempstead, Long Island.
who_you_serve: Stuart serves the community of Port Washington, Long Island, and advocates for animal welfare, particularly for cats.
seeking: Partnerships with nonprofits and community organizations to support cat welfare and legislative change.
offering: Advocacy, community engagement, and awareness initiatives for animal welfare.
service_provided: Advocacy, community engagement, awareness initiatives, consulting on animal welfare issues
current_projects: Establishing a cat shelter in North Hempstead, advocating for municipal responsibility for cats
social_proof: Over 15 years of experience in animal rescue and political advocacy, with a background as a commodities trader.
bio: Over 15 years of experience in animal rescue and political advocacy, with a background as a commodities trader.
business_focus: Stuart Kroll is an animal rights advocate focused on improving conditions for community cats and establishing a municipal cat shelter in North Hempstead, Long Island. (animal rights advocacy)
